programme.desc: A combative man at a fast food restaurant claims his phone was stolen. Multiple illegal items are found on a man parked on the side of the road. An intoxicated man throws an 83-year-old’s walker.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his son’s girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies tase a man who almost ran over a deputy with his truck. A man gives police false information after saving a boy who fell into a pool. A woman tries to buy drugs from an undercover officer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E34 Copy of Warning shot
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call at a local residence. A juvenile with a firearm is detained. Officers respond to a report of a man firing a gun in front of his residence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police respond to an emergency call and find a man in dire trouble. Deputies respond to an abusive husband at a local eatery. Two women try to buy narcotics from an undercover deputy during a sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E22 Barked Up The Wrong Tree
programme.desc: Following a brief slow-speed pursuit, the desperate driver flees on foot. An officer responds to an assault. A dog owner is informed of her dog's mayhem and given a citation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E26 Pitted Against Each Other
programme.desc: A chase ends after one of the police units disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A car pursuit turned foot chase ends with the suspect jumping head first into a creek-bed. Officers catch up to a man trying to flee the scene after assaulting his wife. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle driving with no headlights.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E01 UC Drug Sting I
programme.desc: A man with a suspended license flees a routine traffic stop on foot. Deputies respond to a battered woman after receiving a 911 hang up call. A sting operation nets a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E15 Abandonment of a Trailer
programme.desc: A dangerous high speed motorcycle chase ends in a wreck and a subsequent arrest. A Florida woman is pulled over in a routine traffic stop and is rewarded for her cooperation. A sheriff creates harmony between a quarreling couple at a mobile park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E18 Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: A man takes off from officers when they roll up on a notorious hotspot for dealers. Cops surprise a jaywalker when they find some suspicious items in his supposedly borrowed jacket. A woman takes the heat for her beau when meth is found in their car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A speedy suspect makes officers chase him through a creek. A teenage Good Samaritan gets in the middle of a bizarre domestic dispute. After a woman destroys her home, she begs police to arrest her.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A belligerent gun-toting man doesn't take too well to some harsh parental criticism. A bike rider tries to outpace a policeman then pretends to be someone else. Officers try to coax a rattled hit-and-run driver into coming clean.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E09 What’s my name again?
programme.desc: Officers respond to a threatening man with a weapon. A man gives Officers a false name forgetting he’s wearing his name tag. A suspect in a stolen car collides with another vehicle then flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover Officers organize a buy-bust sting. Racoons hide out in a woman's chimney. A man gets pulled over for soliciting a prostitute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E32 I Always Pay My Debts
programme.desc: A man tries to bite an officer after narcotics are spotted in his mouth. Officers respond to a family fighting in their front yard. A suspect claims to be repaying a debt when he's caught buying drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man wearing women’s underwear exposes himself to a couple and the incident is caught on tape. Officers question a naked man in the backseat of a vehicle who claims to be camping.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers investigate an apparent stabbing. Officers respond to a call about a suspicious man loitering in a private park. A driver insists his vehicle is not stolen even though the plates are.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover officers organize a sting operation to catch drug users. A woman attempts to conceal drugs in her mouth during a routine search. A repeat offender is arrested after threatening offices.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high speed chase comes to a halt in a residential area and the driver is taken in for sobriety testing. A suspicious vehicle takes off as an officer approaches and a high speed chase ensues. An officer pulls over a vehicle belonging to a battery suspect who attempts to eat evidence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E05 Put Your Clothes Back On
programme.desc: Cops try desperately to get an unclothed man to cooperate. After a chase with a pickup truck, officers find a 14-year-old in the driver’s seat. On a routine traffic stop, police contend with a plethora of dope and even more lies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E17 Two Mr. Fix Its
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to flee when officers tell him they will search him. Two men get in a fight over window installation. A hotel room is filled like a clown car with multiple suspects.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a man who attempted to cash a bad check then fled the scene. Police are called when a man’s ex-girlfriend breaks into his house. Police chase an unlicensed teen speeding in a vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver leads police on a slow speed chase towards Las Vegas. Three people are suspected of using contraband. A multi-neighbor dispute devolves into a fight involving guns and bats.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E09 Crazy as a Loon
programme.desc: Officers conduct a traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. Officers conduct a drug-reversal-buy sting to capture buyers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two suspects who were believed to have been involved in a robbery. Police attend to a man who has injected a concerning amount of methamphetamine. Officers break up a fight in progress involving two men outside a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers intervene when an estranged husband kicks his ex-wife’s boyfriend’s car. A man claims someone gave him the car he is driving. A woman claims the pills in her purse are not hers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer assists with a burglary call at a mall jeweler. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call involving two newlyweds at a Las Vegas motel. An accident occurs during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E17 Rocks in my Socks
programme.desc: Deputies discover a purse and a sock containing paraphernalia during an arrest. Deputies pursue an intoxicated motorcyclist. A woman is suspected of stealing a cake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The boat unit contends with an unruly suspect and his equally unpredictable dogs. Two burglary suspects try to claim car trouble when they're found at the scene of the crime. A repentant meth addict is caught by officers on the brink of his latest relapse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An angry customer threatens a store employee with a rock. Officers suspect the ‘medicine’ found in a suspect’s car is actually his business product. A stepfather gets into a fist fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A normal traffic stop turns into an off-road race through a residential neighborhood. Police find a runaway suspect taking refuge in a family member’s closet. A domestic dispute erupts over chips and dip.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers hold a man under a car at gunpoint after a traffic stop. Officers are flagged down and directed to a couple arguing on the street. A man apologizes to detectives for the illicit items they find.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An Officer struggles with a suspect after he appears to reach for a gun. When a car is parked on a desolate road, an officer conducts a routine search and discovers methamphetamine. A woman in a bikini is arrested for driving on a suspended license after an officer pulls her over for a busted tail light.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police conduct a sting operation. A woman is covered in white powder during a traffic stop. Officers spot a young boy on a bike who wandered away from home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E03 Gas up and Run!
programme.desc: A man is tasered twice after struggling with two deputies. A gas station fight ends in a foot chase. A deputy pulls over a pair of quarreling lovers after they run a stop sign.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E07 No Shirt, Lots of Service
programme.desc: When approached by police, a suspect decides to take his shirt off and taunt the officers. Twin sisters ask for help when their third sister is threated by her boyfriend. An intoxicated suspect crashes his wife’s car into a light pole.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect tries to elude officers by driving on a rough road. An argument over a cigarette turns ugly. Kids throw rocks from an overpass at the wrong car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E20 Now It's Lawn Furniture
programme.desc: A traffic stop over a broken brake light turns into a foot chase. A man handles bad news by throwing his furniture out of the window. A vehicle pursuit ends with a K-9 unit’s help.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E08 Step Away From the Cutlery
programme.desc: Cops attempt to piece together whether or not an erratic driver is in a stolen vehicle. A knife-wielding man complains that rude neighbors won’t stop smoking pot. Officers come upon an emotional man with a blade to his throat.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Three men are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at an apartment complex. An officer discovers a teenager is dating an older man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man claims to be protecting the car he breaks into. Officers respond when a couple gets too friendly while out in public. Police are dispatched when a drunk woman pounds on her neighbor’s door.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect bites an Officer while trying to avoid arrest. An Officer responds to a stabbing. An Officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing 4-year-old.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E10 Get Off My Roof
programme.desc: The K-9 unit responds when a gunman takes to the rooftops. A drug exchange goes awry when the dealer tries to ditch his stash. A pickup-driving drunk tries to play it off when he smashes his neighbor's parked car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E03 I Won't Be There for You
programme.desc: A suspect foolishly tries to elude police in a bright yellow sports car. Roommates aren’t always there for each other when police are called to break up a fight. No one in a stopped vehicle wants to admit to ownership of contraband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police officers set up a sting operation using a taxi cab in to bust prostitution. A man claims he can’t remember his ‘girlfriend’s’ name when officers suspect the woman is actually a stranger. Female undercover officers set up a sting operation to bust johns.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, officers stop to talk to a young woman who appears to be soliciting prostitution. A father accuses his son of breaking his jaw. While running from officers, a suspect attempts to drop evidence on the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A repeat offender in Las Vegas attempts an ambitious vertical escape. An officer investigates a domestic call involving an armed male suspect. A driver concealing drugs in his mouth eventually swallows the crack cocaine, but comes clean about his possession.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pancakes, Lobster Soup, Duck, and Flan
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, wild rice pancakes! Next, lobster-lime soup! Followed by a Tuscan porchetta-style duck! Finishing with a flan with port-soaked cherries!

programme.title: Gusto's QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TV's top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, we're serving up 8 of our most popular recipes for feeding a crowd, from hosts like Kyle Crawford and Vanessa Gianfrancesco.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner
programme.desc: Chef Dev shows off a whole day’s worth of street food meals, including Halwa Puri from Pakistan for breakfast, Beef Patties from Jamaica for lunch, and Mapo Tofu from China for dinner.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev prepares some of his favorite South Asian street foods, including Nihari Stew from Pakistan, Momo Dumplings from Nepal, and sweet Jalebi from India.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Country fair treats made right at home! Host Jessica McGovern makes tasty fair-inspired desserts like classic Funnel Cake.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Balancing Sweet with Savoury
programme.desc: A tasty four-course Vietnamese meal using fruit? Yes, please! For her first dish, talented home cook Lisa Nguyen uses tangy tamarind pulp to balance flavours in a savoury bowl of Vietnamese Sour Fish Soup. Then, she combines tart pomelo and sweet pineapple with juicy crab meat for a flavourful salad. Next up, hot Chicken Coconut Curry with a hint of citrusy lemongrass, sweet potatoes, and a kaffir lime leaf. Pair it with a warm, toasty baguette and you're good to go! Lisa's last dish is a mouth-watering, classic Vietnamese dessert. Soft and chewy Steamed Banana Cake drizzled in a sweet velvety coconut sauce crunchy sesame seeds will have you begging for more!

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Renowned Chef Michael Bonacini takes viewers on a culinary tour of the Italian region of Trentino-Alto Adige without leaving his own kitchen.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Make hosting your next shower a cinch with Jessica McGovern's simple and super cute recipes - like tiny Oatmeal Cookie Cheesecake Cups!

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Talented baker Jessica McGovern takes us around the world with diverse desserts from countries like Japan and Germany.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Sweet, Salty, and Surprising Multi-Cooker Recipes
programme.desc: Using a multi-cooker, charming host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks up a four dishes that are salty, sweet, and surprising.

programme.title: The Latin Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Juan Pablo Gonzalez shows us how to impress dinner guests with a mouth-watering Venezuelan four-course meal.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Charismatic host Jessica McGovern whips up classic desserts from the beautiful city of Paris.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Flowers aren't just for smelling - they're great for baking too! Host Jessica McGovern shows us how to bake some tasty desserts with a floral twist.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Lot on Your Plate
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen serves up delicious meals for a busy lifestyle from a mouth-watering breakfast burrito to a no-carb cauliflower pizza.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Cakes and Icings with Chef Tim McRoberts

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Balancing Sweet with Savoury
programme.desc: A tasty four-course Vietnamese meal using fruit? Yes, please! For her first dish, talented home cook Lisa Nguyen uses tangy tamarind pulp to balance flavours in a savoury bowl of Vietnamese Sour Fish Soup. Then, she combines tart pomelo and sweet pineapple with juicy crab meat for a flavourful salad. Next up, hot Chicken Coconut Curry with a hint of citrusy lemongrass, sweet potatoes, and a kaffir lime leaf. Pair it with a warm, toasty baguette and you're good to go! Lisa's last dish is a mouth-watering, classic Vietnamese dessert. Soft and chewy Steamed Banana Cake drizzled in a sweet velvety coconut sauce crunchy sesame seeds will have you begging for more!

programme.title: Global Veggies

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 France, Japan, Morocco, Mexico

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Thailand, France, Sweden, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Thailand - Carrot Pad Thai, France - Ground Cherry Salad, Sweden - Swedish Pecan Balls, and Italy - Corn Farroto!

programme.title: Gusto's QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TV's top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, we're serving up 8 of our most popular recipes for feeding a crowd, from hosts like Kyle Crawford and Vanessa Gianfrancesco.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Culinary expert Theresa Visintin picks the letter "B" and must combine beef with buttermilk for her challenge. But first, she works with the ingredients separately. Silky buttermilk lends itself perfectly to Theresa's battered blooming onion recipe. Using the biggest onion she can find, Theresa skillfully slices from the root down, ensuring it will bloom into a beautiful flower. She coats the Vidalia onion in egg, buttermilk and smoky spiced flour, before deep frying it. Next up, it's time for beef to get the Theresa treatment, as she prepares a crowd favourite- smoky, juicy, fall-off-thebone baked beef brisket. With the perfect balance of sweet and spicy, this meal will make you look...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: After picking "M" for this episode's challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas decides to make meal magic using maple and mahi-mahi. She starts by combining chestnut and quinoa to create a mouth-watering medley, rich in flavour and texture. Chef Lauren adds shiitake mushrooms and drizzles the dish with a balsamic vinegar, maple syrup and rosemary dressing. Next up, she steams Mahi-mahi with red chilies and lemongrass, this savoury spice is a heavenly combination with an invigorating aroma. For the challenge, Chef Lauren seamlessly introduces both maple and mahimahi into one flavourful fusion.

programme.title: Cheeseburgers of the World
programme.desc: Chef Joe Friday cooks up a Juicy Lucy and Louis’ Lunch Burger from the USA as well as Hamburg Steak from Germany.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards shocks Andrea Titus with her DNA results. Blending her two cultures onto one plate, Andrea then cooks up a delicious and revealing meal for her family.

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Long and the Short of It
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing meal featuring long and short ingredients! Josh makes a long sandwich, long grain rice, and a Long Island iced tea in a short glass, while Erica prepares long pepper short ribs, short grain rice, long beans, and long noodles!

programme.title: Spencer's Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Join charismatic chef Spencer Watts at his glorious rooftop patio for a one-hour special featuring a full holiday spread, all made on the BBQ. Spencer’s festive menu is all about creative BBQ twists with his delectable, mouth-watering recipes including Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie, and Asparagus with Smoked Salmon Dip. Save room for the piece de Q-sistance: Smoked Turkey Two Ways. This year, take your holiday feast outside and serve up something deliciously different.

programme.title: Holiday Eatz
programme.desc: Get your 'Gobble Gobble' on with this special episode of Holiday Eatz, featuring fun and charming host Kimberly Lallouz! She starts her terrific Turkey Day menu with a harvest happy Kale Salad heaped with beets, candied pecans, toasted lentils, and goat cheese. Thanksgiving dinner needs Hot Rolls, Chef Lallouz packs hers with cranberries and corn, then serves them as a standalone course with a cheesy, creamy Mushroom Fondue! Next, it's time to talk turkey with a trick that cuts your poultry cooking time in half! Her Spatchcock Turkey is not just faster than old school, it's yummier too, with a garlic-herb marinade and a unique side of mixed beans and rice! Candied sweet potatoes and...

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.desc: In preparation for a relaxing holiday with friends and family, FLOUR POWER THANKSGIVING: PIES GALORE invites you into the kitchen to bring a twist to your Thanksgiving classics. In this holiday special, host Jessica McGovern takes us through three new and exciting treats to bring to your table, sharing some of her favourite tips and tricks along the way. Jessica offers up three alternatives to a standard Thanksgiving dessert - serving up light and flaky Pie Fries with Apple Caramel Dip, a rich and creamy Sweet Potato Pie, and a luscious Vanilla Bourbon Sweet Potato Pie Cake coated in a fluffy marshmallow frosting. These quick and easy recipes will put you in the holiday spirit while...

programme.title: Gusto's QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TV's top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, we're serving up 8 of our most popular raw recipes, from hosts like Pino De Cirbo and Vanessa Gianfrancesco.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Collard Greens, Maple Syrup, Goat Cheddar and Heirloom Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera prepares a frittata, rosemary skewer chicken and grilled bread salad with fresh ingredients from a local farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Broccoli, Rainbow Chard and Herbs
programme.desc: Warm host Amanda Herrera picks up colourful produce and herbs at a farmers' market to make a delicious appetizer and tasty cold oil French fries.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Thai food inspired by other cultures
programme.desc: Thai chef and cookbook author Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how to make Thai dishes that were inspired by other cultures, from steamed dumplings to biryani to Massaman curry and custard tarts.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Argentinian-born chef Natalia Machado makes grilled calamari salad, followed by grilled pizza, and then shows us how to make lamb ravioli, before finishing it off with the best-ever cookies: alfajores.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Deep Fry Episode with Chef Michael Bonacini
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini shows why he is no small fry in revealing his kitchen sizzle. Learn the secrets on sautéing, pan frying and deep frying.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Veal Episode with Chef Michael Cummings
programme.desc: Wonder why chefs like to cook with veal? Chef Michael Cummings heats up the studio while working with various cuts of veal.

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Stuffed Pasta Episode with Chef Tim McRoberts
programme.desc: The secrets of stuffed pasta are revealed as Chef Tim McRoberts dresses each pasta for success by padding them with delicious fillings, sprinkling them with fragrant seasoning and topping each off with the perfect sauce.

programme.title: The Edible Road Show
programme.desc: Carlo has discovered a couple who own a small organic winery on Vancouver Island where they make "balsamico traditionale" made in casks imported from Modano Italy. We also go to Montreal and visit Schwartz's, home of the best smoked meat in the world.

programme.title: The Edible Road Show
programme.desc: The ladies of the Catholic Ukrainian League in Kamsak Saskatchewan (pop. 2300) are world famous for their hand made perogies. Carlo spends the day with them and learns the secrets of this ultimate comfort food. We also go to Norman Wells in the North West Territories to sample Aboriginal fusion cuisine like grilled Caribou, Caesar salad with seal oil, caribou fat ice cream and arctic char sushi.

programme.title: The Edible Road Show
programme.desc: Carlo ventures to Kleinberg Ontario for the annual Feast of Fields gala where local organic farmers team up with some of Canada's most renowned chefs and present delicious nibblies to guests as they wander the beautiful grounds of the McMichael Gallery. We also go to Christmas Island in Nova Scotia for a traditional Celtic Ceilidh and then to the Queen Elizabeth Hotel in the heart of Montreal as Chef Paul Bocuse and Les Chefs Des Chefs are inducted into the venerable Beaver Club.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia

programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas

programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The three super cars from this episode promise more power and more elegance. Thanks to tuning company Kelleners Sport, the new BMW 640i Gran Coupe offers even more bite. Thanks to its beautiful equipment and additional legroom, the Maserati Quattroporte GTS encourages to travelling. Thanks to all-wheel drive, the Porsche 911 Carrera 4S offers more fun and more safety on critical terrain.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

For 50 years Porsche has been making car drivers around the world very happy with its sports cars. In celebration of the anniversary Supercars takes a closer look at the past, present and future models of the Porsche 911.

programme.title: Profile Freeskier Nadine Wallner
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner is a freeskier, climber and mountaineer who has experienced incredible highs and devastating lows on her journey of discovery. She takes part in the Freeride World Tour, the pinnacle of freeriding competition for skiers and snowboarders.

programme.title: Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: Roopkund - Mountainbike Expedition to the Indian Himalaya
programme.desc: Hans Rey, Richie Schley and Joscha Forstreuter travelled to the Indian Himalayas to the mysterious Roopkund Lake, which is known for having hundreds of ancient human skeletons lying dormant at its bottom. This is followed by a descent of 3,500 metres in altitude.

programme.title: Romance
programme.desc: 1999 the old sport of skiing had just been given new life, and Level 1 was conceived. Romance, the final chapter of annual films by Level 1, captures a modern-day Golden Age in skiing. Featuring a generation of talent that came of age in the best time to ever do it.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Full Fight: Gaethje v. Newell
programme.desc: The first ever WSOF lightweight king Justin Gaethje (11-0) attempts his first title defense against undefeated contender Nick Newell (11-0) at WSOF 11, 2014.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Full Fight: Gaethje v. Palomino 1

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning & defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild & exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion & budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.desc: GLORY 45: on September 30, 2017 at the Sporthallen Zuid in Amsterdam, Netherlands. This event also features a 4-Man Light Heavyweight Contender Tournament to earn a shot at the Glory Light Heavyweight Championship. An injury suffered during training has forced former welterweight champion Nieky Holzken out of the bout against Alim Nabiev.

programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E318 King of Hearts S1 E318
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E318 Second Chances S1 E318
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Jodha Akbar S4 E10
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E318 This is Fate S1 E318
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E318 Undercover Love S1 E318
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E72 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E72
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Jodha Akbar S4 E10
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E318 This is Fate S1 E318
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E318 Undercover Love S1 E318
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.desc: What better way to celebrate Unicorn Day than with Monster Jam's very own Sparkle Smash?! Check out Sparkle Smash and the best 2024 and 2025 freestyles, two-wheel skills, sky wheelies, races, and donuts from our favorite unicorn on wheels.

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E16 Best Of 2025 Racing And Freestyle Wins

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.desc: Relive the excitement as Monster Jam drivers celebrate their 2025 Series Championship. Featuring emotional moments, fan appreciation, and highlights from the Arena Series East.

programme.title: Best of Monster Jam
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E17 Best of World Finals 2025 Champions
programme.desc: Monster Jam World Finals 2025 was a night to remember, especially for champions Blake Granger, Todd LeDuc, Tristan England, and Ryan Anderson. Watch their winning runs here and their 2025 season highlights that led them to the World Finals championship!

programme.title: Northern Tool and Equipment Tools for the Trades™
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E01 Monster Jam Mini Build
programme.desc: Northern Tool’s Tools for the Trades™ program and Monster Jam® partnered to inspire the next generation of tradespeople. Bryan, TX high school students, led by instructor Chris Lehde and Monster Jam mentors Colt Stephens, Armando Castro, Matt DelSanter, and Bill Easterly, were challenged to build a mini Monster Jam truck using a 740cc EFI NorthStar engine and raw steel. The project aimed to spark interest in skilled trades through hands-on experience and monster-sized inspiration.
